settings.text:
We drive hardware innovation by offering engineering, manufacturing, prototype development, consulting, and facility design services, with a sub-specialisation in sustainable manufacturing and inclusive design.

We also work with the disabled community, to create impactful assistive technology, aiming to build a more accessible and sustainable world.

settings.heading: What We Make
settings.text: We innovate hardware with sustainable and inclusive processes. We offer a broad range of engineering, design and consulting services; coupled with a subspecialisation in assistive technology and enhancing accessibility.

settings.heading: Why We Do It
settings.text: Because we want to! The.Workshop was started with the ambition of creating products that engineering companies need and supporting game changers in their market. Our first products have improved upon the limited offerings in hardware engineering education and the functionality of disability aids.

settings.heading: Technology
settings.text: Technology plays a crucial role in our products and development processes. CAD and CAM systems ensure precision and consistency in the production process, alongside the simulation of tool paths prior to work taking place. Ultimately improving efficiency. We offer a range of solutions for meeting production needs.
Be the first to know about new products and exclusive offers.
